actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Workforce.

official_title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to delay, until July 1, 2030, the termination of authority to award certain Federal Direct PLUS loans and the implementation of limits on certain loans for graduate and professional students enrolled at institutions with certain public health designations, and for other purposes.
short_title: Protecting Health Care Workforce Pipelines Act

titles.title: Protecting Health Care Workforce Pipelines Act
Protecting Health Care Workforce Pipelines Act

To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to delay, until July 1, 2030, the termination of authority to award certain Federal Direct PLUS loans and the implementation of limits on certain loans for graduate and professional students enrolled at institutions with certain public health designations, and for other purposes.
